TopicTitle: So, its the 'When will 0.22 come out guessing game' thread

Articles.Content: When do you think that 0.22 will come out. (winner will win accusations of witchcraft!)
You do realize that every time someone speculates on a release date, the devs move it back a day, right?
22, this month. Or tomorrow. Or soonÃ‚Â®
Sooner than later.
It will come out in n^2 somethings, where n is the number of threads about release dates.

hmmmm

ill say 15 minutes. 20 minutes tops.
They just entered testing, so a couple more weeks at least. Couldn't say for sure on the date, obviously.
Within the dates of now, and humanity disapearing

It will never come out. The devs have spent the last two months creating 48 hours of elaborate fake gameplay videos, all to give the impression that the update exists. Soon they'll run out of faked footage and go quiet, then eventually they'll disappear without ever explaining what happened.
From now to the heat death of the universe.
Im guessing exactly 2 weeks.
Around a week after youtubers get it it's released,So i'm saying 19-21 oct.
2nd of November, between 7:00PM and 3:00AM GMT.
I think we could get lucky - 15th, maybe the 16th.

3 days after this thread is locked, plus 1 day for every release date thread, multiplied by the number of .22 discussion threads, subtracted by the number of active KSP Devs, and all of that is raised to the power of the amount of bugs discovered during testing.

3 days after this thread is locked, plus 1 day for every release date thread, multiplied by the number of .22 discussion threads, subtracted by the number of active KSP Devs, and all of that is raised to the power of the amount of bugs discovered during testing.

Then take the factorial of that number.

Then take the factorial of that number.

That just makes a number seem very, very excited.

Honestly the devs may just declare .21 to be 1.00 and stop developing forever...

In actual speculation, I expect about two or three weeks from now (sorry; I know that it's considered blasphemy to even vaguely think about release times here but I had to get it out there)
I just hope it's before the 29 Oct. I lose my internet for a few months to relocate. Living in hope, that soon Ã¢â€žÂ¢ is less then 2 weeks
Anytime between now and never.
When GTA V is Released on PC or when Half-Life 3 is accounced.

1-2 weeks.

Unless they hit some serious bug.

( don't take my word for it, i'm just guessing... )
As soon as people forget about it and go online to see the small announcement on the forums.

SoonTM

Seriously, SoonTM
Hmm, I'm guessing haloween.
